hare kṛṣṇa hare kṛṣṇa
    kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa hare hare
    hare rāma hare rāma
    rāma rāma hare hare

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PHIEvuR1bzg

Hare Krishna
Krishna had many avatars(incarnations) in the human history.
Many Moslems after repeatedly saying the mantra got the revelation that Mohamed is a misunderstood avatar of Krishna.
If you achieve the Krishna consciousness then you will understand everything.

2_17LQPJZz9sBC1besM5ZwKFKt9CmndJTjcA.body:
Hare Krishna
What is the advantage of chanting Hare Krishna Maha Mantra?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PHIEvuR1bzg
- It’s free. Chanting Hare Krishna never costs you money.
- Chanting Hare Krishna counteracts the sinful atmosphere of Kali-yuga, the present Age of Hypocrisy and Quarrel.
- A person who chants Hare Krishna develops all good qualities.
- Chanting Hare Krishna gets you out of the endless cycle of birth and death.
- Chanting Hare Krishna will save the world from destruction.
